mapper.update:
update up_clue
up_clue_time = #{upClueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
up_user_code = #{upUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_clue_name = #{upClueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_clue_tel = #{upClueTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_clue_sex = #{upClueSex,jdbcType=CHAR},
up_clue_addre = #{upClueAddre,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_clue_status = #{upClueStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
up_clue_appraise = #{upClueAppraise,jdbcType=CHAR},
up_clue_age = #{upClueAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
up_clue_longitude = #{upClueLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
up_clue_latitude = #{upClueLatitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
up_clue_matchtime = #{upClueMatchtime,jdbcType=DATE},
extra1 = #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extra2 = #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extra3 = #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extra4 = #{extra4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
extra5 = #{extra5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_clue_depttype = #{upClueDepttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_clue_taskId = #{upClueTaskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_aiexecutetime = #{upAiexecutetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
up_aipersontime = #{upAipersontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
up_aipersonendtime = #{upAipersonendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
up_aiendtime = #{upAiendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
up_talktime = #{upTalktime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
up_isEffective = #{upIseffective,jdbcType=CHAR},
where up_clue_code = #{upClueCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update up_clue set up_clue_time = #{upClueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_user_code = #{upUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_clue_name = #{upClueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_clue_tel = #{upClueTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_clue_sex = #{upClueSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, up_clue_addre = #{upClueAddre,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_clue_status = #{upClueStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, up_clue_appraise = #{upClueAppraise,jdbcType=CHAR}, up_clue_age = #{upClueAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, up_clue_longitude = #{upClueLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, up_clue_latitude = #{upClueLatitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, up_clue_matchtime = #{upClueMatchtime,jdbcType=DATE}, extra1 = #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra2 = #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra3 = #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra4 = #{extra4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra5 = #{extra5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_clue_depttype = #{upClueDepttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_clue_taskId = #{upClueTaskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_aiexecutetime = #{upAiexecutetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_aipersontime = #{upAipersontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_aipersonendtime = #{upAipersonendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_aiendtime = #{upAiendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, up_talktime = #{upTalktime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, up_isEffective = #{upIseffective,jdbcType=CHAR} where up_clue_code = #{upClueCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from up_clue where up_clue_longitude = "" || up_clue_longitude is null

select t.up_aiendtime as upAiendtime ,t.up_aipersontime,t.up_clue_tel as up_aiphone,'1' as source from up_clue t where 1=1 and t.up_user_code = #{userCode} and t.up_clue_appraise='1' UNION select m.up_aiendtime as upAiendtime,m.up_aipersontime,m.up_aiphone , '2' as source from up_aiinfo m where m.up_usercode=#{userCode} and m.up_aiappraise='1' and m.up_aipersonendtime is not null and DATEDIFF( NOW(), m.up_aipersonendtime ) < 14 UNION select m.up_aiendtime as upAiendtime,m.up_aipersontime,m.up_aiphone ,'2' as source from up_aiinfo m where m.up_usercode=#{userCode} and m.up_aiappraise='1' and m.up_aipersonendtime is null
